BasicDescription.Title: This Is CBBC!
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Join the CBBC crew for all your favourite programmes, plus loads more! Tune into CBBC everyday from 7.00am to 7.00pm.

BasicDescription.Title: This Is CBBC
BasicDescription.Synopsis: This is CBBC. Programmes begin at 7.00am.

BasicDescription.Title: Stitch Up
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A group of undercover children target members of the public in this practical joke whirlwind. Brush up on your French with help from the tourists and don't mess with our wrestler!
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Xchange
BasicDescription.Synopsis: If you're after celebrities, comedy or chat, this is the show for you. Includes Newsround updates.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: Tel: 0845 900 2222 (local rate) - remember to get permission.

BasicDescription.Title: CBBC At The Fame Academy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Get the latest from the Fame Academy, where the students compete to win the biggest prize money can't buy.

BasicDescription.Title: Newsround
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC joins the Newsround team, who will be keeping you up to date on the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

BasicDescription.Title: Looney Tunes
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Rebel Without Claws: Confederate carrier pigeon Tweety must deliver a message to headquarters, while avoiding Yankee cat Sylvester.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Looney Tunes
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Snow Business: When a blizzard blocks all the roads to Granny's cabin, Granny is unable to return and fears that her two pets, Tweety and Sylvester, will starve.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Looney Tunes
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A Street Cat Named Sylvester: Tweety seeks refuge from the freezing winter weather in the house where Granny lives with her cat and dog, Sylvester and Hector.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Megamaths
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 7-9] Division. Divide By Three: The Kings of Spades discovers his ancestor's treasure chest and he, his wife and his daughter attempt to divide its contents by 3.

BasicDescription.Title: The Experimenter
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 7-9] People. What's The Sense: Sarah gets to taste chocolate flavoured crisps when XP starts his experiments into how humans use their senses.

BasicDescription.Title: Look And Read
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 7-9] Earth Warp. The Final Countdown: With the children coming to the rescue, Ollie recovers just in time to defuse the probe and save Southbeach.

BasicDescription.Title: Primary History
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 7-9] A Walk Through Time. Entertainment: Tony Robinson takes a walk through two thousand years, to discover how people have entertained themselves.

BasicDescription.Title: Landmarks
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 9-11] World Environmental Change. Forest: The Karkonosze in Poland and the Amazonian rainforest. An exploration at the way human beings shape and influence their environments.

BasicDescription.Title: Music Makers
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 9-11] Structure: This series of Music Makers combines a new musical, 'Infinity Diner' with documentary items featuring professional musicians, to explore aspects of music. Today, structure.

BasicDescription.Title: Science Zone
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 9-11] The Environment. Creature Comforts: Michaela Strachan is found wandering on a beach, looking for a home for Kate the lobster.

BasicDescription.Title: Hallo Aus Berlin
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 11-13] German language series. Essen Und Trinken: A look at German food and drinks.

BasicDescription.Title: History File
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 14-16] Nazi Germany. Who Opposed Hitler? Five part series on Nazi Germany.

BasicDescription.Title: Newsround
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC joins the Newsround team, who will be keeping you up to date on the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

BasicDescription.Title: Testament
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 11-14] The Bible In Animation. Daniel: Series of animated Old Testament stories.

BasicDescription.Title: Job Bank
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Events Organiser: Andrew Melville strives to achieve stress-free events for both clients and delegates, and on an event day he can walk miles just checking everything.

BasicDescription.Title: Job Bank
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Radio Assistant Producer: Matt Lomax is a radio assistant producer at Galaxy 105 in Leeds and he gets to work at 6am every day, including some weekends.

BasicDescription.Title: Blue Peter Unleashed
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Ellen McCarthur's here to give you some of her sailing secrets in Tip Off, while Matt gets into some armour and saddles up when he learns how to joust on horse back.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Julia Jekyll And Harriet Hyde
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Love is in the air as Mr Rocket gets engaged to Daisy Figgis.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: There's A Viking In My Bed
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Comedy about a 10th Century Viking who finds himself shipwrecked in a present day seaside town. Siggy embarks on some strange Viking rituals.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Simon And The Witch
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Simon and the Witch both have the idea of saving Valdini's by advertising it using handbills. The Witch drops some beetles on the floor of the cafe, and Sally threatens to close the place down.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Grange Hill
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Clare's on the warpath and Frankie gets a shock.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Animadness
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Stay tuned for nearly two hours of cartoon fun, featuring classic episodes of Looney Tunes plus double helpings of Cramp Twins and Taz-Mania.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Stitch Up
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A group of undercover kids target members of the public in this practical joke whirlwind. Things may 'disappear' before your very eyes, or not as the case may be, with The Visible Man.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Looney Tunes
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The Abominable Snow Rabbit: A classic madcap Warner Brothers cartoons, featuring the wacky adventures of characters like Bugs Bunny, Tweety and Sylvester.

BasicDescription.Title: CBBC At The Fame Academy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Get the latest from the Fame Academy where the students compete to win the biggest prize money can't buy.

BasicDescription.Title: Yo! Diary
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Comedy series based on the books by Jonathan Meres. Josh and TK have an idea for Steven's videos. Meanwhile, Craig makes a shocking discovery.
